TextView.android:text: 11 Pull Ups + 11.11.11. Isometric Hold ---> 11 Dips ---> 15 Push Ups
x3-4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30.30.30. Isometric Hold (r)
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Chin Ups + 20.20.20. Isometric Hold
x2 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
1 min DeadHang Hold
x5 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
5-10x 50kg Squats ---> 10x 20kg Lunges (E/S)
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20x 20kg Squats ---> 20 Jumping Squats ---> 45 second Wall Sit with 10kg
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30x 10kg One-Legged Calf Raises (E/S) ---> 20 One-Legged Calf Raises
x3 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
5 Wide Pull Ups ---> 5 Close Grip Pull Ups
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
13 Dips ---> 17 Wide Push Ups
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Bar Leg Raises ---> 5 Bar Knee Raises ---> 1 min Hollow Hold
x3 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
1 min Plank with 10kg ---> 1 min Plank
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
20x 30kg Squats ---> 20 Jumping Squats ---> 1 min Wall Sit
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 One-Legged Glute Bridges (E/S) ---> 1 min Broad Jumps
x3 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
15x 20kg Jumping Lunges (E/S) ---> 20 Lunges (E/S)
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15 Diamond Push Ups ---> 10 Dips + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold ---> 5 Wide Push Ups
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Bar Knee Raise Hold for 45 seconds
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Max Sit Ups ---> 10 Chin Ups
x4 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Beginner Program Level 3 - Week 5
